com.myronmarston.music
Class MidiSoundbank

java.lang.Object
  com.myronmarston.music.MidiSoundbank

public class MidiSoundbank
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapper around the java midi soundbank interface. Lets you set the midi soundbank that will be used to generate the audio files.

Method Summary
static MidiSoundbank getCurrent()
          Gets the current midi soundbank.
 javax.sound.midi.Soundbank getSoundbank()
          Gets the java soundbank instance for this soundbank.
